questions.question: The apples …………………………. I bought yesterday were very good.
questions.description: In identifying relative clauses both which and that can refer to things.

questions.question: The weather …………………………. fine we went for a swim.
If he had worked hard, he ………………………….. the test.
The more you read, ………………………………
questions.description: The same comparative structure should be used in both clauses.

questions.question: …………………………… she is suffering from arthritis, she cannot climb stairs.
………………………… you are honest, I will trust you.
……………………….. the cop, the thief ran away.
questions.description: The present participle is used to connect two actions that happen in quick succession.

questions.question: She is ………………………….. to lift the box.
questions.description: Enough goes after the adjective or adverb modified by it.

questions.question: Petrol as well as natural gas ……………………….. by India.
questions.description: When we connect two nouns with as well as, the verb agrees with the former.

questions.question: He is ………………………….. ill that the doctors do not expect him to recover.
After she ……………………………. her homework, she went out to play.
questions.description: The simple past is possible here but the past perfect is considered more appropriate.

questions.question: The boy …………………………… watch had been stolen complained to the police.
